entry.title: Atomic coin swapping?
entry.summary: In an email conversation on September 22, 2012, Jorge Tim√≥n expressed his interest in transitive/multi-hop transactions using Ripple with colored coins and wondered why it was not possible. Jeff Garzik replied, saying that the crucial piece he was missing was SIGHASH_ALL. He updated his post with a concrete example and detailed instructions for programmers to recreate. Jeff Garzik is the founder of exMULTI, Inc.
